content:
I apologize for the confusion. Here are some interesting facts about these cleaning products:

* Machine rinse aid helps to remove residue from dishes and glassware, leaving them sparkling clean.
* Glasswash rinse aid is specially designed for use in commercial dishwashers to help prevent water spots and ensure that glasses come out crystal clear.
* Machine glasswash is a powerful cleaning product that can be used to clean glassware and dishes in commercial settings.
* Foodsafe sanitiser is a cleaning product that is safe for use in food preparation areas and can help to kill bacteria and prevent the spread of germs.
* Handy sanitiser is a convenient cleaning product that can be used to disinfect hands and surfaces on the go.
* Spray & wipe is a versatile cleaning product that can be used to clean a variety of surfaces, including countertops, sinks, and appliances.
* Handy antibacterial is a powerful cleaning product that can help to kill germs and bacteria on surfaces.
* Lemon floor gel is a floor cleaner that contains natural lemon extract to leave floors clean and smelling fresh.
